channel.title: Data Science on Alex Melemenidis's homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science on Alex Melemenidis's homepage

item.title: Bee Observer
item.description:
Through my MeetUp newsletter I randomly stumbled upon the Rhein-Main local chapter of Correlaid, a non-profit organisation that is supporting other NPOs in data science and digital projects. For my thesis project I joined the on-going collaboration with the University of Bremen on the project Bee Observer (BOB). Through sensors in beehives this project aims at helping beekeepers in their regular activities and create a large dataset for bee research.

Read the thesis HERE.

item.title: Talking to data scientists about bees
item.description: During our first talk on CorrelCon 2020, my project teammates Diren Senger (University of Bremen), Alexander Goncharskiy and I (both Correlaid x Rhein-Main) presented our work in the Bee Observer project, along with the general topic of bees and what Citizen Science means. Watch the recording of the talk to get a flavour.
